definitions: To start or operate (an engine or machine) by turning a crank or by means of a starter motor.
To produce a sound or music at a high volume.
To increase the speed, power, or intensity of something.
examples: He had to crank the old car to get it started.
Please don't crank up the music so loud.
The team needs to crank out more widgets to meet demand.
She cranked the window down to feel the breeze.
